pkgmetadata.longdescription: Design and Analysis of Hierarchical Composite Endpoints // Simulate and analyze hierarchical composite endpoints. Win odds is the main analysis method, but other win statistics (win ratio, net benefit) are also implemented, provided there is no censoring. See Gasparyan SB et al (2023) "Hierarchical Composite Endpoints in COVID-19: The DARE-19 Trial." Case Studies in Innovative Clinical Trials, 95-148. Chapman; Hall/CRC. doi:10.1201/9781003288640-7.
